Name: Fairytale Figurine: Watch Your Footing
Desc: A humanoid figurine who has been restrained, vividly recreating the Constellation Metropole citizenry when stuck with superglue. Can be placed on a "Good Shelf" for display.\nBesides its normal adhesive functions, superglue is occasionally used as a movement restrictor. However, regardless of the situation in which such glue is used, one must be careful with one's footing. Even a slight misstep could see one wind up just like the model.
